Articles.Content:
I just installed some new mods, and my game just keeps crashing whenever I load something, go to the launchpad, open up the loader, etc. 

My mods are:

  • AresExploration
  • ASET
  • CommunityResourcePack
  • CTN
  • CTNN
  • FASA
  • HabitatPack
  • HullCameraVDS
  • JSI
  • KerbalJointReinforcement
  • KerbalKonstructs
  • Kerbaltek
  • KSPWheel
  • MechJeb2
  • NANA
  • PlanetaryBaseInc
  • SPACE_SHUTTLE_SYSTEM
  • SSTU
  • TweakScale

The mods I just installed are:

  • ASET
  • CommunityResourcePack
  • SPACE_SHUTTLE_SYSTEM
  • SSTU

Does anyone know if any of these mods are interfering with each other, or any other reason why my game keeps crashing. 

When it crashes, it doesn't bring up a notification it crashed, it just closes in like a millisecond, if that information can help.
